Package com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem

Interface AnActionExtensionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompareRevisionsAction, CompareRevisionsFromFileHistoryActionProvider, CreatePatchFromDirectoryAction, CreatePatchFromHistoryActionProvider, CreatePatchFromHistoryActionProvider.Clipboard, CreatePatchFromHistoryActionProvider.Dialog, DiffShelvedChangesActionProvider, DiffShelvedChangesWithLocalActionProvider, ShowDiffAction, ShowDiffAfterWithLocalFromFileHistoryActionProvider, ShowDiffAfterWithLocalFromLogActionProvider, ShowDiffFromLocalChangesActionProvider, ShowDiffWithLocalAction, ShowDiffWithLocalAction.ShowDiffBeforeWithLocalAction, ShowDiffWithLocalFromTableHistoryAction, ShowUpdatedDiffActionProvider, VcsLogCreatePatchActionProvider, VcsLogCreatePatchActionProvider.Clipboard, VcsLogCreatePatchActionProvider.Dialog, VcsSelectionHistoryDialog.MyDiffAction, VcsSelectionHistoryDialog.MyDiffAfterWithLocalAction

    public interface AnActionExtensionProvider
    Allows to override AnAction behavior in some context, not affecting the others. Note, that various flags cannot be overridden. Ex: AnAction.isEnabledInModalContext() PossiblyDumbAware.isDumbAware() AnAction.isTransparentUpdate()
    See Also:
    ExtendableAction

      boolean isActive(AnActionEvent e) 
      void update(AnActionEvent e) 

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        boolean isActive(AnActionEvent e)
        Returns:
        whether current provider should be used in given context

        Provider should not modify presentation in this method. Only the first active provider will be used.

      • update

        void update(AnActionEvent e)
